CmdLine: apt-get update  && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 	docker.io 	curl 	git 	iputils-ping 	vim 	less 	jq 	python 	python3 	sudo 	ca-certificates 	host 	net-tools     openssh-client     nmap     file  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "export DOCKER_API_VERSION=\$(docker version 2> >(grep -Po '\d+\.\d+' | tail -n 1) >/dev/null)" >> /root/.bashrc  && printf '$include /etc/inputrc\nset completion-ignore-case On\n' > /root/.inputrc
Commands.Name: run
